page.title: 15BRIGHSTONE HOLIDAY CAMP.
page.content: The holiday camp is situated between the cliffs and the Military Road. It was built in 1939 when it had 17 acres of land. The rapid erosion of the cliffs has left it with only 8 acres. The camp is made up of a number of chalets around a grassy area. There is a putting green on the grass. The camp also offers crocquet,bowls, netball, basketball and crazy golf.There is bingo, dancing and live entertainment in the evenings. We were allowed to use te indoor heated swimming pool. It was quite large with a big curved slide! The pool was not being used by the residents at that time as most of them were Old Aged Pensioners. The owner told us that most of the visitors were old but that he had some families with young children staying. Over 60 people are employed here.
